name: 陳志恆
objective:
介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
Fundamentals of structure and properties of carbon compounds. Emphasis on reaction mechanisms, synthesis, stereochemistry, as well as chemical and spectroscopic methods of analysis.
schedule:

1	課程說明 (introduction)
2	Chapter 2 Structure and Properties of Organic Molecules. 
Chapter 3 Structure and Stereochemistry of Alkanes
3	Chapter 4 The Study of Chemical Reactions
4	Chapter 6 Alkyl Halides: Nucleophilic Substitution and Elimination
5	Chapter 6 Alkyl Halides: Nucleophilic Substitution and Elimination
6	Chapter 8 Reactions of Alkenes
7	Chapter 9 Alkynes

15	Chapter 17 Reactions of Aromatic Compounds
16	Chapter 18 Ketones and Aldehydes
